feature.name: 19-24 Cell Support  13-18 Cell Support  7-12 Cell Support
feature.summary: The 19-24 Cell Support feature increases the number of supported cells from 18 to 24

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.pdcchCfiMode
parameters.description: Cell unlocking can be rejected because of shortage of PUCCH                                 resources. This triggers the Resource Configuration                                     Failure alarm. Required and available PUCCH                                 resources for a cell in FDD depends on the following:    Number of cells per node     Cell bandwidths     The pdcchCfiMode,                                             noOfPucchCqiUsers, and                                             noOfPucchSrUsers parameters     For more information about parameter dependencies, see Control Channel Dimensioning.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.noOfPucchCqiUsers
parameters.description: Cell unlocking can be rejected because of shortage of PUCCH                                 resources. This triggers the Resource Configuration                                     Failure alarm. Required and available PUCCH                                 resources for a cell in FDD depends on the following:    Number of cells per node     Cell bandwidths     The pdcchCfiMode,                                             noOfPucchCqiUsers, and                                             noOfPucchSrUsers parameters     For more information about parameter dependencies, see Control Channel Dimensioning.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.noOfPucchSrUsers
parameters.description: Cell unlocking can be rejected because of shortage of PUCCH                                 resources. This triggers the Resource Configuration                                     Failure alarm. Required and available PUCCH                                 resources for a cell in FDD depends on the following:    Number of cells per node     Cell bandwidths     The pdcchCfiMode,                                             noOfPucchCqiUsers, and                                             noOfPucchSrUsers parameters     For more information about parameter dependencies, see Control Channel Dimensioning.

feature.activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011974 MO instance.
feature.deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011974 MO instance.
